caption.p: Return periods of peak wind speed at the Battery. ( A) Mean return period of peak wind speed at the Battery for the MPI, CCSM4, and IPSL models during the time periods 1981–2000 and 2081–2100. ( B) Mean return period of peak wind speed at The Battery for the MPI, CCSM4, IPSL, HadGEM, GFDL, MRI, and MIROC models during the time periods 1981–2000 and 2081–2100.
